plugin.name: contact_us
plugin.title: Contact Us
plugin.summary: This plugin makes users able to contact site administrator using a special form.
plugin.author: Intelliants LLC

phrases.phrase:
To edit this text go to:

Admin Dashboard → System → Languages → Edit phrases

and search by key: contact_top_text.
Start every subject with a new line. Subject should be represented by a phrase key existed in your language pack. If any phrase does not exist in the pack the input will be displayed as it is.

install.sql: CREATE TABLE `{prefix}contacts` ( `id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `fullname` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `email` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `subject` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `phone` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `body` text NOT NULL, `date` datetime NOT NULL, `ip` bigint(12) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) {mysql_version};
